title: AMD unveils MI300x AI chip as 'generative AI accelerator'
description: To be able to run an entire 40-billion parameter model in memory, said Lisa Su, actually reduces the number of GPUs you need.

title: TikTok's new Script Generator tool uses AI to write ad scripts for you in seconds
description: Have trouble writing an ad script? Here's how you can let TikTok write it for you.

title: Google's latest Pixel feature drop is here. Check out what's new
description: Both Pixel phones and the Pixel Watch are gaining new features and capabilities with the latest update.

title: Docker 101: How to install Docker on Ubuntu Server 22.04
description: Jack Wallen walks you through the process of installing the latest community edition of the Docker container runtime engine on Ubuntu Server 22.04.

title: How to add a quick-dial widget to your Android home screen (and why you should)
description: If you have contacts that you regularly and frequently call, you're going to want to use this handy Android feature.

title: The best Alexa devices of 2023: Echo, Ring, and more
description: "Hey ZDNET, which Alexa device is best?" We did hands-on testing and research to find the answer, keeping in mind your smart home preferences and needs.

title: The Beatles are dropping one last track with the help of AI
description: AI has the potential to change the music industry. Here's what Paul McCartney has to say about it.

title: Would you trust AI-generated reviews? The next Amazon product you buy may have them
description: Amazon is testing out generative AI to summarize its product reviews for its customers on some products across the store.

title: How to customize the Pixel At a Glance feature so you get only the information you want
description: Google's At a Glance feature offers a bit more customization on the Pixel than it does on other devices. Here's how to make it more useful for you.

title: These $400 XR glasses gave my MacBook a 120-inch screen to work with
description: Viture's One extended reality glasses are a clever and portable way to work and play. Here's what they get right and what they get wrong.

title: Are smartphone thermal cameras sensitive enough to uncover PIN codes?
description: I started out thinking that these cameras were gimmicks, but they've become an important tool in my toolbox. Here's why - and a little test.

title: Now you can have a voice conversation with Bing Chat. Here's how
description: Microsoft's latest updates gives Bing Chat a voice of its own, as well as the ability to answer verbal prompts.

title: This rugged Blackview phone truly has it all - and it's 50% off right now
description: Are you looking for an Android 13 phone that offers thermal imaging, night vision, and won't break the bank? Check this out.

title: Unexpected bill? This AI bot can 'Haggle It' for you
description: Don't let anxiety over a large bill keep you up at night. Instead, let generative AI take the strain.

title: How to hack Facebook with just a phone number
description: Updated: A flaw in the SS7 protocol made hacking Facebook accounts easier than you'd think.

title: Your next employer is more interested in your skills than your degrees
description: Fewer Americans are obtaining college degrees and employers are shifting their focus to an applicant's skill set.
